page.title: 17WEEKENDS 1
page.content: In my house on Saturday,my mum goes to her Saturday job,so my dad is left to cope with my brother and I.In the morning I get up at 7.00, and I have usually washed,dressed,and eaten my breakfast by 8.00.My brother and dad however,don't get dressed until about 10.00 or 11.00. At 9.30 I usually call for my best friend Claire Whitehorn.We either go jogging or roller-booting.At 12.15 I go back home,get changed,have dinner,and catch the bus to dancing.At 4.00 my dad picks me up from dancing, and we go shopping in town.At six we collect my mum from work,have tea,and watch T.V until about 9.30. On Sunday mornings we tend to lie in. Mornings tend to be boring so usually I read until dinner.On Sundays it's a roast. In the afternoon we may go to a car boot sale or visit my nan and grandad. {By Karen Mortimer aged 11
